A4.text: Breckinridge was the Southern Democratic candidate in the 1860 presidential election, losing to antislavery Republican candidate Abraham Lincoln.

A5.text: A third party, the Constitutional Union Party, nominated John Bell.

A6.text: Hon. John C. Breckinridge, Democratic nominee for president
